title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid and complete information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm that the user receives a registration success message and can proceed to login.

title: User Registration with Missing Mandatory Fields
description: Verify appropriate error messages appear when mandatory fields are missing on the registration form.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit the registration form.
Validate that the system displays error messages indicating the missing fields.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that users can log in successfully using valid username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm the user is redirected to their profile or home page after successful login.

title: User Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is shown with wrong username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid or incorrect username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Check that login is unsuccessful and an error notification is displayed.

title: User Profile Update
description: Ensure users can successfully update their profile information including name, bio, and profile picture.

steps.description: Log in to the user account.
Navigate to the profile settings page.
Modify profile fields such as name and bio.
Save the changes.
Verify that updated profile information is saved and displayed correctly.

title: Post a Question in Community Q&A
description: Validate that users can post new car-related questions and that the questions appear in real time on the Q&A feed.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Community Q&A section.
Click 'Ask a Question' and enter a valid question title and details.
Submit the question.
Confirm that the question appears immediately in the Q&A feed and is accessible.

title: Answer a Question in Community Q&A
description: Ensure users can provide answers to existing questions and that answers update in real time.

steps.description: Navigate to a posted question under Community Q&A.
Enter a valid answer in the answer input field.
Submit the answer.
Verify that the answer appears instantly and updates the answer count.

title: Post a Feed Story
description: Check that users can post feed content and temporary stories and that they are visible to other users.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Feeds or Stories section.
Create a new feed post including text and optionally an image or link.
Submit the feed post.
Confirm that the feed post appears in user and community feeds.

title: Create and Join Groups
description: Validate that a user can create a new group and other users can search and join the group successfully.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Groups section.
Create a new group with valid details.
Log in as a different user.
Search for the created group and join it.
Ensure both group creation and joining are successful and reflected immediately.

title: Create and Participate in Events
description: Verify users can create events, RSVP to events, and see real-time event updates.

steps.description: Navigate to Events section after login.
Create a new event with date, time, and description.
Submit the event creation.
As another user, view the event and RSVP 'Attending'.
Check event is visible with correct details and RSVP status updates in real time.

title: RTL Layout and Localization Switching
description: Validate UI and content fully support Arabic language with correct RTL layout and dynamic content translation.

steps.description: Log in and set user language preference to Arabic.
Navigate through multiple pages including Q&A, feeds, maps, groups, and admin dashboard.
Verify that all displayed content is in Arabic and UI layout switches properly to RTL orientation.

title: Map Display with Localized Points of Interest
description: Ensure the maps display car-friendly locations and tracks correctly in both English and Arabic with proper localization.

steps.description: Navigate to the Maps section.
View points of interest in English language setting.
Switch language to Arabic and reload the maps.
Confirm POIs names and map labels are accurately translated and layout is correctly RTL for Arabic.

title: Real-Time Messaging between Users
description: Validate that private messages are sent and received instantly between two users using SignalR integration.

steps.description: Log in as User A and open chat with User B.
Send a text message to User B.
Log in as User B on a different session or device.
Verify User B receives the message instantly and can reply with real-time delivery to User A.

title: Real-Time Notifications Delivery
description: Check that notifications such as new messages, event updates, or group invites are delivered instantly and displayed properly.

steps.description: Trigger a notification event such as sending a message or inviting a user to an event.
Confirm the receiving user gets the notification immediately and it is visible on the UI.

title: AI Assistant Response Accuracy
description: Verify that the AI assistant integrated with Google Gemini and Hugging Face responds accurately to common car-related queries.

steps.description: Open the AI assistant chat widget.
Submit a set of predefined car-related questions to the assistant.
Check that the assistant replies correctly and contextually with meaningful answers.

title: AI Assistant Responsiveness on Multiple Devices
description: Ensure the AI assistant chat widget displays and functions responsively on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Access the platform on desktop, tablet, and mobile device browsers.
Open and interact with the AI assistant chat widget on each device.
Verify the widget is fully functional, visually consistent, and responsive across all tested devices.

title: Admin Dashboard Content Management
description: Confirm that admins can create, edit, and delete community content such as Q&A entries, feed posts, groups, and events.

steps.description: Log in to the Admin Dashboard.
Create new entries, edit existing community content, and delete items.
Ensure all changes are applied immediately and correctly reflected on the user-facing platform.

title: Admin Dashboard Localization Management
description: Verify that admins can update and manage dynamic translations and localization settings from the dashboard and changes reflect live.

steps.description: Access localization management section in Admin Dashboard.
Update or add new translations for both English and Arabic languages.
Confirm that updated translations are applied site-wide without requiring a system restart.

title: Secure Access to Admin Dashboard
description: Ensure that only authenticated users with admin privileges can access the dashboard and unauthorized users are blocked.

steps.description: Attempt to access the admin dashboard without logging in.
Verify access is denied and redirected to login page.
Log in as a non-admin user and attempt dashboard access.
Ensure access is denied and appropriate error or redirect is issued.
Log in as an admin user and open the dashboard.
Confirm full access to dashboard management features.
